enemy."},{"lineNumber":172551,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":172552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……って、お前は」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Wait, you are\""},{"lineNumber":172553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":172554,"originalJapaneseLine":"薄暗い道の先から","translatedEnglishLine":"From the dim path ahead,"},{"lineNumber":172555,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふらふらのシャリエラが現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"a staggering Shaliera appeared."},{"lineNumber":172556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ランスだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, it's Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":172557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうして、お前がここにいる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why are you here?\""},{"lineNumber":172558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ランスのせい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Because of Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":172559,"originalJapaneseLine":"「床の崩落にシャリエラまで巻き込まれた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The floor collapsed and Shaliera got caught in it too.\""},{"lineNumber":172560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「気絶していて誰にも気づかれなかったけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was unconscious and no one noticed, but...\""},{"lineNumber":172561,"originalJapaneseLine":"　目が覚めたからとりあえずこっちに来てみた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I woke up and came this way for now.\""},{"lineNumber":172562,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんにしても、無事で良かったです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway, I'm glad you're safe...\""},{"lineNumber":172563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、俺らは今から人間界に帰るところだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, we're about to return to the human world now."},{"lineNumber":172564,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シャリエラも来るといい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Shaliera, you should come too.\""},{"lineNumber":172565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　なんで？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? Why?\""},{"lineNumber":172566,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリス様の所に帰るよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm going back to Lord Cavris's place.\""},{"lineNumber":172567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...\""},{"lineNumber":172568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいおい、あんな危ない奴の所に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, are you serious about going back to such a dangerous guy's place?\""},{"lineNumber":172569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　帰るつもりか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You really intend to return there?\""},{"lineNumber":172570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「別に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not really...\""},{"lineNumber":172571,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シャリエラは人形だから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shaliera is a doll,"},{"lineNumber":172572,"originalJapaneseLine":"　危険とかそういうの感じない」","translatedEnglishLine":"so she doesn't feel things like danger.\""},{"lineNumber":172573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……む、死ぬかも知れんぞ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm, she might die, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":172574,"originalJapaneseLine":"「別に構わない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't mind."},{"lineNumber":172575,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シャリエラは人形だから」","translatedEnglishLine":"She's a doll after all.\""},{"lineNumber":172576,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmmmm.\""},{"lineNumber":172577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um...\""},{"lineNumber":172578,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この子知り合いなの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is this girl someone you know?\""},{"lineNumber":172579,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間なのに、自分を人形だと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She's human, but she believes"},{"lineNumber":172580,"originalJapaneseLine":"　思い込んでるなんて……","translatedEnglishLine":"she is a doll...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ以上戦っても俺様の女が死ぬだけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we fight any longer, only my woman will die."
"From now on, we'll just holed up in JAPAN,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍相手にどれだけ防衛戦できるかだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "and see how well we can defend against the demon army."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの頭をぽんぽんしてから、
ランスは皆に向き直った。
魔物界を突き進むだけでも大変だから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's tough enough just pushing through the demon realm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 覚悟しておけよ、お前ら」
「お前は今すぐランス城に戻って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You go back to Rance Castle immediately

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の話をウルザちゃん達に知らせろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and inform Urza and the others about what we just discussed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んで、可能なら俺達が帰還する為の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And if possible, tell them to provide us with

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 援護もしろと言っておけ」
「ああ、それからランス城に着いた後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, and after you arrive at Rance Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでの道の確保もウルザちゃん達に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure the path is secure up to there — Urza and the others will handle it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道の先を見るフェリスにつられ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Following Ferys who looked down the path,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵かとランスが身構える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance prepared himself, thinking it might be an enemy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふらふらのシャリエラが現れた。
「どうして、お前がここにいる」
「床の崩落にシャリエラまで巻き込まれた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The floor collapsed and Shaliera got caught in it too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気絶していて誰にも気づかれなかったけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was unconscious and no one noticed, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目が覚めたからとりあえずこっちに来てみた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I woke up and came this way for now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんにしても、無事で良かったです……」
「よし、俺らは今から人間界に帰るところだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, we're about to return to the human world now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラも来るといい」
ケイブリス様の所に帰るよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going back to Lord Cavris's place."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいおい、あんな危ない奴の所に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey, are you serious about going back to such a dangerous guy's place?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 危険とかそういうの感じない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so she doesn't feel things like danger."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラは人形だから」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this girl someone you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間なのに、自分を人形だと

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
